attributes.action: urge HMRC to stop the attacks on Flexibility .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned note the flexibility proposals made by the Head of HMRC Contact Centres. We feel these proposals are an attack on our hard won terms and conditions. Furthermore they go against Gordon Brown's proposal to extend Flexible Working in Britain made on 6 November 2007.
We ask the Prime Minister to call on HMRC to withdraw these proposals immediatley.
